statements: SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE full_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, address, phone_number, preferences FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address IS NOT NULL AND phone_number LIKE '(555)%' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, preferences->>'favorite_color' AS favorite_color FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'subscription' = 'active';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT customer_id, name, preferences FROM customers WHERE preferences LIKE '%discount%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE preference_name LIKE '%special%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.customer_name, p.preference_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name, address FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT id, email, date_of_birth FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, date_of_birth ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';

SELECT customers.name, orders.order_date, products.product_name, products.price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.order_id = products.product_id ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;

SELECT customers.name, preferences.marketing_emails, preferences.newsletter_subscription FROM customers JOIN preferences ON customers.id = preferences.customer_id WHERE preferences.marketing_emails = TRUE OR preferences.newsletter_subscription = TRUE;
SELECT customers.name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customers.name HAVING SUM(orders.total_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id ASC
SELECT customer_id, name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 1000
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY category
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM preferences
